last_episode_to_air.name: I've Read Every Book Ever Written, and a Few More
last_episode_to_air.overview: With his release pending, Clark starts meeting with a writer working on his biography, but there are parts of his life he doesn't want to talk about.

name: Clark
overview: This is the incredible story behind Sweden's most notorious gangster, Clark Olofsson, whose infamous crimes gave rise to the term "Stockholm Syndrome".

episodes.name: Being the Best at Being the Best Was Not My Thing, So I Decided to Be the Best at Being the Worst
episodes.overview: After spending most of his short life in and out of juvenile detention, Clark makes his first jailbreak and meets the love of his life — and her mother.

episodes.name: I Automatically Do Everything Opposite the Rest of the World
episodes.overview: Inspired by his activist girlfriend, Clark starts a prisoners' rights movement that spreads across penal facilities all over Sweden.

episodes.name: They See Me as a Mix of Pippi Longstocking and Al Capone
episodes.overview: Clark loves the oranges in Beirut so much, he decides to export them into Sweden — but citrus isn't the only thing he's dealing in.

episodes.name: Let the Party Begin
episodes.overview: The Norrmalmstorg robbery is underway. The media is covering everything live, and the police make it clear they're willing to use deadly force.

episodes.name: Why Would I Have a Job? I Don't Have Time for S**t Like That and You'll Miss Out on All the Fun Stuff
episodes.overview: Maria's mother convinces the prison to let Clark act in her play, providing him with the perfect opportunity to get up to his old tricks.

episodes.name: I've Read Every Book Ever Written, and a Few More
episodes.overview: With his release pending, Clark starts meeting with a writer working on his biography, but there are parts of his life he doesn't want to talk about.
